DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine effect whole body electromyostimulation ( WB-EMS ) and/or nutritional body composition functional task elderly female sarcopenic obesity . Seventy-five , non-sportive , independently live woman 70 year old Sarcopenic Obesity randomly assign either WB-EMS group ( n=25 ) , WB-EMS/nutritional supplement ( n=25 ) semi-active control group ( an=25 ) . The WB-EMS protocol apply one session 18 min/week WB-EMS ( bipolar , 85 Hz ) . Nutritional strategy base high protein supplement .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Whole-body Electromyostimulation Dietary Supplements `` Sarcopenic Obesity ''
DOC.criteria: community dwell Sarcopenic Obesity exercise 60 min/week 4 week absent interventional period , injury ( i.e . hip TotalEndoProsthesis ( TEP ) , abdomen/groin hernia ) diseases ( i.e . epilepsy , cardiac arrhythmia ) prevent WBEMS intervention medication and/or diseases affect primary endpoint .
